CustomField.description: "To determine whether the treatment cycle took place for fertility preservation purposes (where the female patient does not intend to use the oocytes or resulting embryos within the next 12 months)."
CustomField.label: ANZARD - Fertility preservation

value.fullName: 2 = Yes, storing for future use ONLY (>12 months time)
value.label: 2 = Yes, storing for future use ONLY (>12 months time)
